item.description:
Hi folks! Let's bundle up, get some exercise and beat the winter blues, while walking and talking with a group of friends!  This Meetup will take place at West Woods Trails, which is a Guilford Land Trust preserve in Guilford, CT. Snow is no deterrent, barring treacherous driving conditions!!

$2 DONATION: Please contribute a minimum donation of two dollars towards the fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.  Please email organizer directly and in advance if you have questions or concerns regarding this suggested donation.  Please also note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

Meet at 11:55 or 12:00 at the Sam Hill Road entrance, and we will begin hiking at five after. We will hike for about two hours.

DIRECTIONS: For this hike, we will meet at the Sam Hill Road entrance. From I-95 exit 57. Go east on Route 1 approximately one and a quarter mile. At the second stop light make a right hand turn onto River Street. When the road ends, turn right onto Route 146 (Water Street). Travel a little over a mile, and make a right hand turn onto Sam Hill Road just before the railroad bridge. The trail entrance with parking is immediately on your left.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Group Organizer) will be wearing red

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Westwoods Walk
